name: Dice Shooters
description: In this game, your goal is to shoot as many  targets as possible before you run out of lives. Destroy targets, upgrade your gun at the shop, and get the highest score! P.S shoot the dice for a  chance to win a lot of money and points and watch out for the ghost targets they will take two hits to break. This game is inspired by both my game Protector and another game I like called Sharp Shooter. I also got some of the sound effects from Incompetech-Music, so I recommend you check out their website (Check Notes & Credits for more).
